message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $13000 for the product. Let me know if this is within your range.

Hi Bob, I understand your position.  While I value your interest, $13000 is a little low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13500.  This is still a fair price considering the value of the product, and it allows us both to make a good deal.  Let me know what you think.
